response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $100. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects the product's value while also allowing me to earn a fair profit. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and provide you with excellent value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding.", "product_price": 120}
